ERforResearch 0.1.0.9006
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Demo ERforResearch
  • Changelog

Changelog

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9006

  • added unit tests.
  • plot functions are not based on the snfverse anymore.

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9005

  • new cluster_er() function to cluster the ER and plot them
  • further smaller updates to default model

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9004

  • added a vignette
  • added get_sucra() function
  • added plot_rankogram() function
  • added get_mcmc_samples() function
  • added the get_mock_data() function
  • unexported the functions not based on JAGS (to see what to do with them)

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9003

  • function to plot ER with confidence interval
  • base jags functionality on posterior distributions
  • have the get_all_ranks() function save the posterior parameters if needed
  • the get_er_from_jags() function now also adjusts for non independent thetas

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9002

  • add Sys.sleep() between different model calls to avoid crashing
  • add n_chains, n_iter & n_warmup as parameters to get_all_ranks()

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9001

  • added implementation with STAN package as an option in the get_all_ranks() function
  • todo: change JAGS functions to being able to account for the covariance too

ERforResearch 0.1.0.9000

  • added ER functions closely following Lingsma et al
  • added JAGS versions of the functionality

Contents

Developed by Rachel Heyard.
